results.deck: Lips returns with a new catalog of songs and the same light-up microphones.
results.name: Lips: Number One Hits

results.deck: no info
results.name: Rendition: Guantanamo

results.deck: Grab the mic and prove you got swagger in this hip-hop-focused music game from 4mm Games and Terminal Reality.
results.name: Def Jam Rapstar

results.deck: Join Sonic, Amigo, Ulala, and a bunch more classic Sega characters in this kart-style racing game.
results.name: Sonic & Sega All-Stars Racing

results.deck: Janline is an Xbox 360 board game that was only released in Japan.
results.name: Janline

results.deck: A multiplayer-focused, class-based first-person shooter in which oppressive soldiers and anarchistic terrorists battle for the few remaining resources on a failed paradise known as the Ark.
results.name: Brink

results.deck: Lego Indiana Jones 2 retells the stories from the original trilogy in new levels, as well as the story of Kingdom of the Crystal Skull. It will also have a level editor.
results.name: LEGO Indiana Jones 2: The Adventure Continues

results.deck: FIFA 10 is EA Sports' 2009-2010 edition of the successful football game franchise.
results.name: FIFA 10

results.deck: Play as a quick-witted natural disaster, and wreak havoc down below.
results.name: Tornado Outbreak

results.deck: The popular LEGO franchise adds Harry Potter to its list of conquests in this action-adventure from Warner Bros and Traveller's Tales. The game covers the first four books/movies, and Hogwarts acts as a main hub, containing many secret areas and unlockables.
results.name: LEGO Harry Potter: Years 1-4

results.deck: Set three years after the original Crysis, an ambushed Marine named Alcatraz dons the famous Nanosuit and fights his way through an obliterated New York City to stop the alien invasion.
results.name: Crysis 2

results.deck: Four new survivors must work together to make it through the zombie apocalypse in the Southern United States, facing new threats and traversing new terrain as they fight their way through this sequel to Valve's critically acclaimed Left 4 Dead.
results.name: Left 4 Dead 2

results.deck: A post-apocalyptic shooter from Teyon
results.name: Forsaken Patrol

results.deck: Halo: Reach is the prequel to Halo: Combat Evolved, and chronicles one of the most cataclysmic events of the Halo Universe, the destruction of the UNSC fortress world Reach, through the eyes of a squad of Spartan super-soldiers known as Noble Team.
results.name: Halo: Reach

results.deck: Crackdown 2 is the sequel to the popular open-world supercop game. Players return to Pacific City, where rampaging mutants and gangs vie for control of the streets.  The sequel adds four-player co-op along with competitive multiplayer.
results.name: Crackdown 2

results.deck: Kinect Joy Ride is an Avatar-based kart racing game with an infamous level of auto-steering, and a Kinect launch title.
results.name: Kinect Joy Ride

results.deck: When SpongeBob misplaces the Krabby Patty formula, he must relive some of his best, and worst, memories to try and remember where it is. Unfortunately, the dastardly Plankton is trying to make him remember so he can steal it for himself.
results.name: SpongeBob's Truth or Square

results.deck: A fast-paced action game co-developed by PlatinumGames and Kojima Productions. It follows ninja-cyborg Raiden's activities several years after the events of Metal Gear Solid 4.
results.name: Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance

results.deck: Based on the popular ride at Disney Hollywood Studios.
results.name: Toy Story Mania!

results.deck: EA Sports MMA is a mixed martial arts game for the Xbox 360 and PS3, developed by EA Tiburon.
results.name: EA Sports MMA

results.deck: Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker is the latest portable entry in the Metal Gear franchise, and the second canonical Metal Gear title produced for the PSP. Set in Costa Rica, Peace Walker puts you in control of Big Boss once again as he prepares the rise of Outer Heaven.
results.name: Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker

results.deck: Based on the motion picture inspired by the 1963 Maurice Sendak picture book of the same name.
results.name: Where The Wild Things Are

results.deck: Peter Molyneux's cancelled Kinect-based project. It features a young boy who interacts with the player by recognizing facial features and the tone of the player's voice.
results.name: Milo and Kate

results.deck: Summer Athletics is back with the 2009 edition
results.name: Summer Athletics 2009

results.deck: Based off the Pixar film, Cars
results.name: Cars: Race-O-Rama

results.deck: Warriors: Legends of Troy is a western-developed take on Koei's Musou franchise set during the Trojan War.
results.name: Warriors: Legends of Troy

results.deck: The eleventh game of the SmackDown! games developed by Yuke's Co.
results.name: WWE SmackDown! vs. RAW 2010

results.deck: Play as six Ice Age characters as they embark on a rescue mission across melting snow to the mysterious Dinosaur World.
results.name: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs

results.deck: The second episodic Watchmen game picks up where the first one left off with the story of Night Owl and Rorschach pre-Watchmen (the film and book).
results.name: Watchmen: The End is Nigh Part 2

results.deck: NBA 2K10 is the 11th installment in the series and is to be released on October 6, 2009.
results.name: NBA 2K10

results.deck: Battlefield 3 is DICE's third numerical installment in the Battlefield franchise. It features a single player and co-operative campaign, as well as an extensive multiplayer component.
results.name: Battlefield 3

results.deck: Fireburst is an off-road action racing game featuring vehicles that burst into flames.
results.name: Fireburst

results.deck: EA's annual basketball series returns for the 2009-10 NBA season
results.name: NBA Live 10

results.deck: The newest hockey game from 2K Sports has Washington Capitals star Alexander Ovechkin as cover athlete for the 10th anniversary edition of the game.
results.name: NHL 2K10

results.deck: SuperStar is a Korean karaoke game from Studio9.
results.name: SuperStar Karaoke

results.deck: This is a special-edition release of FIFA 06 focused on the World Cup.
results.name: FIFA 06: Road To FIFA World Cup

results.deck: 11eyes CrossOver is a Japanese dating simulation released for Xbox 360.
results.name: 11eyes CrossOver

results.deck: This Dynasty Warriors game was the first to come to Xbox 360, but it wasn't released in English-speaking territories.
results.name: Shin Sangoku Musou 4 Special

results.deck: Manage your own soccer team in this simulation from Eidos.
results.name: Championship Manager 2007

results.deck: An anime mech action game.
results.name: Zegapain XOR

results.deck: Necessary Force was the last title that Midway Newcastle worked on before the studio's closure on July 2009. It was set to be a Tech Noir-styled open world adventure where you played a detective who would solve crimes and generally clean up the fictional city.
results.name: Necessary Force

results.deck: Bakugan Battle Brawlers is the multi-platform video game tie-in into the popular Japanese Action adventure cartoon of the same name.  It is a thematic hybrid between a card battle cartoon (e.g., Yu-Gi-Oh) and a creature collecting/battle cartoon (e.g., Pokemon, Digimon).
results.name: Bakugan Battle Brawlers

results.deck: An upcoming RTS from WorldForge and Play Ten.
results.name: Battle of Atlantis

results.deck: A belated action-adventure tie-in to the popular television show Prison Break.
results.name: Prison Break: The Conspiracy

results.deck: Record of Agarest War is a strategy role-playing game with dating sim elements.
results.name: Record of Agarest War

results.deck: Xbox 360 mahjong game
results.name: Tsuushin Taisen Mahjong: Touryuumon

results.deck: The tie-in to the Steven Spielberg/Peter Jackson Tintin movie, it was developed by Ubisoft Montpellier.
results.name: The Adventures of Tintin

results.deck: Superstars V8 Racing is licensed by the Italian Championship racing league, letting you race with a variety of V8 engines. The game includes a number of important car manufacturers such as BMW, Jaguar and Audi. Everything has been designed to be as realistic as possible.
results.name: Superstars V8 Racing

results.deck: Sequel to the cult hit action RPG Two Worlds, Two worlds II takes place years after the original and follows the story of the character from the first Two Worlds as he continues his struggle to defeat Lord Gandohar.
results.name: Two Worlds II

results.deck: A third person action game where you take control of Crow, who must kill Khan and save Frame City. The game was canceled by Namco in 2006.
results.name: Frame City Killer

results.deck: Speak Out English is a Korean release designed to teach English to Koreans.
results.name: Speak Out English

results.deck: THQ's youth-oriented adaptation of the Disney/Pixar film of the same name.
results.name: Up

results.deck: A young and inexperienced Lara Croft is shipwrecked on a mysterious island in this reboot of the beloved action adventure franchise, departing from the mood of prior games in the series.
results.name: Tomb Raider

results.deck:
Indianapolis 500 Evolution lets you relive racing at indy in the 60's.

Game features much more then the Indy 500, build and race your car the way you want.
results.name: Indianapolis 500 Evolution

results.deck: The next installment of the GHTP franchise. A paintball simulation, available for the Xbox 360 and Wii.  To be released soon for the PS3.
results.name: Greg Hastings Paintball 2

results.deck: A community game released on Xbox Live. It is about a blue sphere with enormous eyes that can teleport.
results.name: Skwug

results.deck: Momotaro Dentetsu 16 GOLD is an Xbox 360 version of a long-running train-themed board game.
results.name: Momotaro Dentetsu 16 GOLD

results.deck: A port of the PSP game for HD consoles. Voice acting has been reintroduced for almost every line in the game.
results.name: Shin Sangoku Musou: Multi Raid Special

results.deck: Cabela's Big Game Hunter 2010 is the latest in the Big Game Hunter franchise.
results.name: Cabela's Big Game Hunter 2010

results.deck: A remake of the first game in the pre-eminent video game horror series, featuring a graphics overhaul, as well as several new gameplay features, environments, and unlockable modes that weren't included within the original version.
results.name: Resident Evil

results.deck: Demonik was planned to be a tie in for a new movie from Clive Barker.  The game was shown at E3 2005, but canceled amidst Majesco's financial problems.
results.name: Demonik

results.deck: Rock Band Metal Track Pack is a standalone game that packages up 20 metal songs from Rock Band's library.  It includes songs from Black Tide, Judas Priest, Rage Against The Machine, and more.
results.name: Rock Band: Metal Track Pack

results.deck: An all new for 2009 hunting and fishing game.
results.name: Cabela's Outdoor Adventures

results.deck: The third game in the Fable series sets you with the task of overthrowing your own brother, the tyrant ruler of Albion, as the kingdom enters the industrial era.
results.name: Fable III

results.deck: The third entry to the franchise known as 'Alarm für Cobra 11' in Germany.
results.name: Crash Time III

results.deck: Join three friends in 10 real bowling locations and journey from amateur to tour pro.
results.name: Brunswick Pro Bowling

results.deck: As young thief Tepeu, you accompany the enormously powerful but simple Majin across a world lost to darkness to save the kingdom and fulfill his destiny in this new action-adventure title from Namco Bandai and Yoshiki Okamoto.
results.name: Majin and the Forsaken Kingdom

results.deck: Rock Band 3 spices up the brand with the addition of a keyboard peripheral as well as "Pro Mode," and offers eighty-three new songs to rock out to.
results.name: Rock Band 3

results.deck: Karaoke Revolution returns with new music, characters, and venues.
results.name: Karaoke Revolution

results.deck: A fun kart racing gaming with everyone's favorite animal escapees.
results.name: Madagascar Kartz

results.deck: A high-school romance based visual novel for the PS2 and Xbox 360, developed and published by 5pb.
results.name: Memories Off 6: T-Wave

results.deck: "The Strike" is a fishing game for the Xbox 360, Wii & PC that can be played with a fishing rod peripheral.
results.name: Bass Pro Shops: The Strike

results.deck: SBK 09 simulates the 2009 season of the World Superbike Championship for consoles and PC.
results.name: SBK: Superbike World Championship 09

results.deck: Enslaved: Odyssey to the West is an action adventure game developed by Ninja Theory and published by Namco-Bandai. A very loose retelling of "Journey to the West," Enslaved follows the story of Monkey and Trip as they attempt to cross a post-apocalyptic Planet Earth.
results.name: Enslaved: Odyssey to the West

results.deck: "Qubed" a compilation disc of three previously released Xbox Live Arcade games: "Lumines Live!", "Every Extend Extra Extreme", and "Rez HD".
results.name: Qubed

results.deck: Skate 3 features a cooperative career mode, new tricks, a robust set of community features, and a suite of creation tools for logos, films, and skate parks.
results.name: Skate 3

results.deck: The sequel to 2007's critically acclaimed role-playing game, The Witcher. Players again take control of Geralt of Rivia in this story-focused adventure.
results.name: The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings

results.deck: The second, and most popular, entry in the Science Adventure series of visual novels. Centers around a group of friends who accidentally invent a device that can send text messages back in time, sparking a pandemonium of alternate timelines and conspiracies. El Psy Kongroo.
results.name: Steins;Gate

results.deck: BlazBlue returns in the form of an updated and rebalanced version of BlazBlue: Calamity Trigger. With new modes, moves, characters, stages and fight mechanics.
results.name: BlazBlue: Continuum Shift

results.deck: MotoGP 09/10 is the latest installment in the MotoGP series.
results.name: MotoGP 09/10

results.deck: The prequel to Record of Agarest War and a tactical role playing game developed by Compile Heart and Red Entertainment.
results.name: Record of Agarest War Zero

results.deck: An included package with the Xbox LIVE Arcade SKU. It includes Feeding Frenzy, Luxor 2, Boom Boom Rocket, Pac-Man Championship Edition and Uno as well as many other game demos and trailers.
results.name: Xbox LIVE Arcade Compilation Disc

results.deck: The sequel to Senko no Ronde.
results.name: Senko no Ronde DUO

results.deck: Super Street Fighter IV is a standalone update to its predecessor, adding new characters, modes, and online features.
results.name: Super Street Fighter IV

results.deck: Collect clues and solve cases alongside the cast of CSI.
results.name: CSI: Deadly Intent

results.deck: A snowboarding game in which you can race, play freestyle or free ride down the mountain.
results.name: Stoked: Big Air Edition

results.deck: A television game show on your video game system.
results.name: Are You Smarter than a 5th Grader? Game Time

results.deck: Jurassic: The Hunted is a sci-fi first-person shooter developed by Cauldron in which you travel back in time using 13 different weapons to survive 12 levels of dino shooting action. It's up to Dylan to figure out what the foxtrot is going on in the Bermuda Triangle.
results.name: Jurassic: The Hunted

results.deck: The latest game in the Scene It? series continues to have the great 4 player trivia action of the original games but will now be available on all three consoles.
results.name: Scene It? Bright Lights! Big Screen!

results.deck: Fist of the North Star: Ken's Rage is a brutal third-person brawler based on the hyper-gory post-apocalyptic action anime and manga series Fist of the North Star. You are already dead.
results.name: Fist of the North Star:  Ken's Rage

results.deck: An action game set in the Ivalice universe from the Final Fantasy series. The project was originally in development at GRIN but has since been moved to a different yet-undisclosed studio.
results.name: Fortress (working title)

results.deck: D3 is publishing this Ben 10 Alien Force game on multiple platforms.
results.name: Ben 10 Alien Force: Vilgax Attacks

results.deck: Real NFL players and teams appear as kids in this youth-oriented seven-on-seven football game.
results.name: Backyard Football '10

results.deck: Inversion puts you in destructible, gravity-shifting environments, giving control over futuristic weapons like the Gravlink. With said weapon, players can move objects for cover, assault on enemies, or solve puzzles.
results.name: Inversion

results.deck: EA Sports' college basketball title with former Oklahoma forward Blake Griffin as the cover athlete.
results.name: NCAA Basketball 10

results.deck: Based on the Discovery Channel series of the same name, Man vs. Wild follows former commando Bear Grylls into remote areas as he demonstrates how to survive harsh weather, hostile animals, and other natural dangers.
results.name: Man vs. Wild
